rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do: to establish shorter school days, weeks or both.

You may wish to sign the below petitions which call for similar actions:

To make Friday one less day of school, to allow kids to reset for monday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596

Require all schools to have at least 75 minutes of break time a day: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638655

If you want the Government to do something different to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to start a new petition you'll need to provide your full name.
